variables.label: Application | Version
variables.description: Version tag of Novu's Docker images. Check out their valid tags at https://github.com/novuhq/novu/pkgs/container/novu%2Fapi

variables.label: Application | Image URL
variables.description: URL to Novu's Docker images.

variables.label: Redis | Version
variables.description: Version tag of Redis' image. Check out their valid tags at https://hub.docker.com/_/redis/tags

variables.label: MongoDB | Version
variables.description: Version tag of MongoDB's image. Check out their valid tags at https://hub.docker.com/_/mongo/tags

variables.label: General | Environment
variables.description: Application environment (e.g `dev`, `test`, `prod`, `ci`, `local`).

variables.label: General | Docker-Hosted Environment
variables.description: Whether to the application is hosted in Docker.

variables.label: General | User ID
variables.description: User ID that the process uses, run `id $user` on your instance to see the ID.

variables.label: General | Group ID
variables.description: Group ID that the process uses, run `id $user` on your instance to see the ID.

variables.label: Security | JWT Secret
variables.description: Secret for JWT.

variables.label: Security | Store Encryption Key
variables.description: Key for store encryption.

variables.label: Privacy | Disable User Registration
variables.description: Whether to disable user registration.

variables.label: API | Port
variables.description: Port of Novu's API.

variables.label: API | Sentry DSN
variables.description: Sentry's DSN for error tracking. Leave empty to disable.

variables.label: Redis | Port
variables.description: Port of Redis' host.

variables.label: Redis | Database Index
variables.description: Index of the database in Redis.

variables.label: MongoDB | Database Name
variables.description: Name of the database in MongoDB.

variables.label: Networking | Embed Port
variables.description: Port of Novu's embed host.

variables.label: Networking | Widget Port
variables.description: Port of Novu's widget host.

variables.label: Networking | Web Port
variables.description: Port of Novu's web host.

variables.label: Networking | WebSocket Port
variables.description: Port of Novu's WebSocket host.

variables.label: S3 | Local Stack URL
variables.description: URL to Localstack instance. Leave to `http://localhost:4566` to use local file storage.

variables.label: S3 | Bucket Name
variables.description: Name of the bucket. Leave to `novu-local` to use local file storage.

variables.label: S3 | Region
variables.description: Region of the storage. Leave to `us-east-1` if using local file storage.

variables.label: S3 | AWS Access Key ID
variables.description: Access key ID for AWS. Leave to `test` to use local file storage.

variables.label: S3 | AWS Secret Access Key
variables.description: Secret access key for AWS. Leave to `test` to use local file storage.

instructions.start:
Novu is a fully functional real-time notification center for your web and react apps.
The only open-source notifications infrastructure that manages multi-channel content, scheduled notifications, digest engine, user preferences, and delivers Email, SMS, Push and Chat notifications using a single API.
instructions.end:
Novu has been successfully deployed! It might take few moments before it's fully started.
You can access it at `http://$$cap_appname.$$cap_root_domain`.

description: Open Source Notification Infrastructure For Developers
